message_1: A math student needs to find the value of the binomial coefficient (8,3). What is the answer?
message_2:
To find the value of the binomial coefficient (8,3), we can use the formula:

C(n, k) = n! / (k!(n-k)!)

where n = 8, k = 3, and ! denotes the factorial.

C(8,3) = 8! / (3!(8-3)!)

C(8,3) = 8! / (3!5!)

C(8,3) = (8 × 7 × 6 × 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1) / ((3 × 2 × 1)(5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1))

C(8,3) = (8 × 7 × 6) / (3 × 2 × 1)

C(8,3) = 336 / 6

C(8,3) = 56

So, the value of the binomial coefficient (8,3) is 56.
